refnamediv.refpurpose: compress a string_output with gzip algorithm

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The string_output_gz_compress compresses its string_output argument using the gzip algorithm and writes the result to another string_output given as an argument. When successful, the number of bytes written to str_out_out is returned.

refsect2.title: str_out_in
refsect2.para: A string session as returned by string_output function.

refsect2.title: str_out_out
refsect2.para: A string session as returned by string_output function.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: INTEGER number of bytes written to str_out_out

example.title: GZIP test
example.para: Test if the gzip implementation works.
